name: Comet
description: You transform into a streak of icy cosmic energy and launch yourself to an empty tile within a very short (5 unit) distance that you can see. When you arrive, you can make an attack against one adjacent creature, dealing 10 cold damage if they fail a defense check of 7.
charge: The range increases to short (10 units) and you deal the cold damage to all adjacent creatures instead of just one.
